list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hard creamy-white substance composing the main part of the tusks of an elephant, walrus, or narwhal, often (especially formerly) used to make ornaments and other articles.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a knife with an ivory handle
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một con dao với một tay cầm ngà
